last_episode_to_air.name: A Second Chance?
last_episode_to_air.overview: Aberegg struggles to stay clean on the outside. Reyes's retaliation puts her release date in jeopardy. Kristler reflects on the progress she's made.

name: Girls Incarcerated
overview: An eight-part documentary series that goes behind the scenes at Madison Juvenile Correctional Facility in Indiana, where teenage girls struggle to overcome their troubled pasts and find hope for the future.

episodes.name: Chapter 1: The Girls of Madison
episodes.overview: Brianna likes being a "bad girl" but knows she needs to change. Newcomer Paige rubs feisty Heidi the wrong way. Chrissy and Aubrey await their release.

episodes.name: Chapter 2: Until We Meet Again
episodes.overview: Trouble finds Aubrey on the outside. Najwa finishes her time but can't go home without a guardian. The girls say goodbye to a beloved counselor.

episodes.name: Chapter 3: Mean Girls
episodes.overview: Brianna and her friends feud with Faith, an outsider. Paige lands in time out, disappointing her dad. Back with her family, Chrissy gets a fresh start.

episodes.name: Chapter 4: Where the Story Begins
episodes.overview: Sarah, whose mom got her addicted to heroin, returns to Madison. Taryn tries to forgive herself after a friend's death. Family Day stirs up emotions.

episodes.name: Chapter 5: Love in Lockup
episodes.overview: Soft-spoken Alexis falls for Armani, who helps her cope with a traumatic past. Brianna's dad lets her down again. Chrissy is thriving on the outside.

episodes.name: Chapter 6: High Expectations
episodes.overview: Courtney's on track to graduate high school at Madison and has plans for college. But Brianna's future is uncertain as her release date approaches.

episodes.name: Chapter 7: My Life Story
episodes.overview: Alexis worries about losing Armani. Cassie's afraid to return home to a neighborhood plagued by drugs and violence. Heidi opens up about her past.

episodes.name: Chapter 8: Moving Mountains
episodes.overview: Heidi's release date gets moved after she acts out. Paige shares a powerful poem at Madison's talent show. Najwa celebrates her 16th birthday.

episodes.name: The Girls of LaPorte
episodes.overview: Aberegg hopes her dad will visit. Jealousy causes drama between Stokes and Rose. Hale recounts how she used drugs to cope with her father's death.

episodes.name: The Graduates
episodes.overview: As the girls get ready to graduate, teen mom Kristler struggles with depression, while Stokes and Hale have poignant reunions with their mothers.

episodes.name: Do as I Say, Not as I Do
episodes.overview: With her mom facing jail time, Rose's home life hangs in the balance. Moody tries to be a role model to her younger cousin. Davis disrespects Galipeau.

episodes.name: Visitation Day
episodes.overview: Reyes returns to LaPorte after violating parole. Thomas worries about disappointing her grandma. Aberegg gets an unexpected visitor on Family Day.

episodes.name: The Boiling Point
episodes.overview: When Rose is attacked, the girls face serious consequences. Johnson has an emotional breakdown, and Thomas's temper lands her in trouble again.

episodes.name: My Past Doesn't Define Me
episodes.overview: Depressed on her mom's birthday, Reyes finds comfort in her grandma. Davis and Johnson give conflict resolution a try. Aberegg's placement is in limbo.

episodes.name: The Life Ahead
episodes.overview: Rose and Aberegg get ready to leave LaPorte. Kristler makes a sweet gesture to Galipeau. Reyes's relationship with her girlfriend takes an ugly turn.

episodes.name: A Second Chance?
episodes.overview: Aberegg struggles to stay clean on the outside. Reyes's retaliation puts her release date in jeopardy. Kristler reflects on the progress she's made.
